title: Мафия
gm-role-description: The NARRATOR tells the story and keeps players engaged.
mafioso-role-description: A MAFIOSO wakes up every night and can kill an INNOCENT.
innocent-role-description: An INNOCENT is a poor victim. But careful, don't let your attention wander!
detective-role-description: The Detective wakes up every night and can find out whether a players is a Mafioso.
doctor-role-description: The Doctor wakes up every night and protects another player. The selected player cannot be killed by the mafia that night.
witness-role-description: The Witness can spy on the mafia during the night. The Witness should do so carefully, lest they be discovered and killed.
jailer-role-description: The Jailer wakes up every night and can find out whether a players is a Mafioso. If so, that player goes to jail, where is unable to act during the night. When the Jailer dies, all mafiosi walk free.
vigilante-role-description: The Vigilante wakes up every night and can decide to kill another player.
godfather-role-description: The Godfather wakes up with the mafia, but appears as an Innocent.
medium-role-description: The Medium wakes up every night and can decide to communicate with the dead.
bodyguard-role-description: The Bodyguard wakes up during the first night to choose another player. If that player were to die to the mafia, the Bodyguard dies instead.
cultleader-role-description: The Cult Leader wakes up every night and selects another player to be converted to their cult. After that, all cultists wake up to meet (except for the cultist). The night all players wake up, the cultist wins.
snitch-role-description: The Snitch wakes up every other night and selects another player. The next morning, the selected player is publicly announced as a Mafioso.
cupid-role-description: The Lovers wake up the first night to meet. They win when they are the only two players left.
killer-role-description: The Killer wakes up every night to kill another player. The Killer wins when all other players are dead.
suicidal-role-description: The Suicidal attempts to convince the Innocents to lynch them. When that happens, the Suicidal wins.
warveteran-role-description: The War Veteran will survive the first attack of the mafia.
